meanings.definition: A type of file extension used for storing video game data.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded some roms to play my favorite video games on the computer.
meanings.sent2: The roms for the classic Nintendo games are highly sought after by collectors.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that he had so many roms on his computer, it was like a virtual arcade.
meanings.sent4: The roms acted as digital time capsules, preserving the nostalgia of old games.
meanings.sent5: The roms contained the magical worlds where I could escape reality and have fun.
